text: The Armenian population data in the Ottoman Empire is as follows: == 1881–1893 == * Six Armenian Vilayets (1867–1922) 1881–1893Ottoman census, 1881–1893. % Armenian Vilayet Total population Armenian population Van 132.007 55.051 41,70% Bitlis 338.642 108.050 31,90% Mamuret-ul-Aziz 466.579 83.394 17,87% Erzurum 637.015 120.147 18,86% Sivas 980.876 129.085 13,16% Diyarbekir 414.657 60.175 14,51% Total 2.969.776 555.902 18,71% == 1914 == * Six Armenian Vilayets (1867–1922) 1914Ottoman census, 1914. % Armenian Vilayet Total population Armenian population Van 259.141 67.792 26,16% Bitlis 437.479 117.492 26,85% Mamuret-ul-Aziz 538.227 79.821 14,83% Erzurum 815.432 134.377 16,47% Sivas 1.169.443 147.099 12,57% Diyarbekir 619.825 65.850 10,62% Total 3.839.547 612.431 15,95% == References == Category:Ottoman Empire Category:Armenian people
title: Armenian population in Ottoman Empire
